item.title: Getting started with jquery-selectors
item.description: Installation or Setup # 1 Tag Name Represents a tag name available in the DOM. For example $('p') selects all paragraphs <p> in the document. 2 Tag ID Represents a tag available with the given ID in the DOM. For example $('#some-id') selects the single element in the document that has an ID of some-id. 3 Tag Class Represents a tag available with the given class in the DOM. For example $('.
